SENT.plain: Intrahepatic artery aneuryms are a rare and potentially life-threatening condition
We present the first case in the English literature of multiple intrahepatic artery aneuryms in a patient with BehÃ§et's disease who presented acutely with rupture
The ruptured aneurysm was treated successfully with transcatheter arterial coil embolization-CT and clinical follow-up confirming a good result
We discuss the management dilemma with regard to prophylactic embolization of the numerous other small asymptomatic intrahepatic aneurysms in this same patient
